anime.name: Death Note
anime.story_resume: A high school student named Light Yagami discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.

anime.name: Full Metal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.story_resume: Two brothers attempt to use alchemy to bring their mother back to life and end up on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone.

anime.name: Attack on Titan
anime.story_resume: People live in fear of Titans, giant humanoid creatures who devour humans seemingly without reason.

anime.name: One Piece
anime.story_resume: Monkey D. Luffy sets out on a journey to become the King of the Pirates and find the One Piece, a legendary treasure hidden in the Grand Line.

anime.name: Naruto Shippuden
anime.story_resume: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja, sets out to become the Hokage, the leader of his village, and gain the respect of his peers.

anime.name: Bleach
anime.story_resume: Ichigo Kurosaki becomes a substitute Soul Reaper and battles Hollows and other supernatural enemies to protect the living world and the afterlife.

anime.name: Dragon Ball Z
anime.story_resume: Goku, a powerful warrior from the Saiyan race, fights to protect Earth from villains who seek the Dragon Balls, seven mystical orbs that grant wishes.
anime.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Martial Arts

anime.name: Code Geass
anime.story_resume: Lelouch, a Britannian prince, gains the power of the Geass and joins the Black Knights to defeat his father and take control of Britannia.

anime.name: Steins;Gate
anime.story_resume: A group of friends discover a time-traveling method using a microwave and get pulled into a dark conspiracy involving SERN, a secret organization with time-travel technology.

anime.name: Soul Eater
anime.story_resume: Students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy train to become weapon meisters and fight against evil forces.
